text: Abdulaziz bin Abdullah Al-Sheikh ( ʿAbd al-ʿAzīz ibn ʿAbd Āllah Āl ash-Sheikh; born 30 November 1940), is a Muslim scholar and current Chief Mufti of Saudi Arabia. As Grand Mufti, he is the head of the Standing Committee on Islamic Studies and Fatwas on Issues. ==References== == Other websites == * http://alifta.com/Fatawa/MoftyDetails.aspx?languagename=en&ID;=8 Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Salafis Category:Grand Muftis of Saudi Arabia
title: Abdulaziz Al Sheikh
